text: I Often Think of Piroschka () is a 1955 West German romantic comedy movie directed by Kurt Hoffmann and starring Liselotte Pulver, Gunnar MÃ¶ller, Wera Frydtberg. It is based on the novel of the same name by Hugo Hartung and was distributed by Bavaria Film. == Other websites == * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:1955 romance movies Category:1950s romantic comedy movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Kurt Hoffmann Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in Hungary Category:Movies based on books
